text:
e="preserve">Jacques Pereira (3 February 1955 – 3 November 2020), known simply as Jacques, was a Portuguese professional footballer. He played as a striker. Pereira was born in Casablanca, Morocco. He made one appearance for the Portugal national football team in 1981. He also had a long career with Braga and FC Porto. His career lasted from 1970 to 1992.
Jacques died on 3 November 2020 in his home of Vila Real de Santo António, Portugal from heart failure at the age of 65.
